name: Let's Go Jungle! Lost on the Island of Spice
overview:
Let's Go Jungle! Lost on the Island of Spice is a gun-mounted, on-rail shooter by Sega, released to arcades on June 27, 2006 using the Lindbergh board. Stranded on an island overrun by monsters, blast your way through looking for rescue.

Another version of the game, Let's Go Jungle! Special, has players sitting on a revolving seat in front of and behind two large projection screens. This version helped inspire the development of The House of the Dead 4 Special.

A sequel was released in 2011 called Let's Go Island: Lost on the Island of Tropics. A spiritual sequel, Transformers: Human Alliance, was released in 2014.
